sessionViewer.title: Session History
sessionViewer.description: View and export your past Active Listening sessions and AI-generated insights.
sessionViewer.empty: No Active Listening sessions yet. Start a session to see your insights here.

onboarding.subtitle: To get started, choose a transcription model

parakeet-tdt-0.6b-v2.name: Parakeet V2
parakeet-tdt-0.6b-v2.description: English only. The best model for English speakers.

moonshine-base.name: Moonshine Base
moonshine-base.description: Very fast, English only. Handles accents well.

permissions.title: Permissions Required
permissions.description: Handy needs a couple of permissions to work properly.

microphone.title: Microphone Access
microphone.description: Required to hear your voice for transcription.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Access
accessibility.description: Required to type transcribed text into your applications.

errors.checkFailed: Failed to check permissions. Please try again.
errors.requestFailed: Failed to request permission. Please try again.

modelSelector.downloadPrompt: Download a model below to get started with transcription.

shortcut.title: Handy Shortcuts
shortcut.description: Configure keyboard shortcuts to trigger speech-to-text recording

ask_ai.name: Ask AI Shortcut
ask_ai.description: Hold to record a question, release to get AI response.

toggle_overlay.name: Toggle Overlay
toggle_overlay.description: Temporarily hide or show the recording overlay.

errors.reset: Failed to reset shortcut to original value

language.title: Language
language.description: Select the language for speech recognition. Auto will automatically determine the language, while selecting a specific language can improve accuracy for that language.
language.descriptionUnsupported: Parakeet model automatically detects the language. No manual selection is needed.

pushToTalk.label: Push To Talk
pushToTalk.description: Hold to record, release to stop

audioFeedback.label: Audio Feedback
audioFeedback.description: Play sound when recording starts and stops

outputDevice.title: Output Device
outputDevice.description: Select your preferred audio output device for feedback sounds

volume.title: Volume
volume.description: Adjust the volume of audio feedback sounds

startHidden.label: Start Hidden
startHidden.description: Launch to system tray without opening the window.

autostart.label: Launch on Startup
autostart.description: Automatically start Handy when you log in to your computer.

overlay.title: Overlay Position
overlay.description: Display visual feedback overlay during recording and transcription. On Linux 'None' is recommended.

privateOverlay.label: Private Overlay
privateOverlay.description: Hide the overlay from screen capture and sharing applications (Zoom, Teams, etc.)

pasteMethod.title: Paste Method
pasteMethod.description: Choose how text is inserted. Direct: simulates typing via system input. None: skips paste, only updates history/clipboard.

clipboardHandling.title: Clipboard Handling
clipboardHandling.description: Don't Modify Clipboard preserves your current clipboard contents after transcription. Copy to Clipboard leaves the transcription result in your clipboard after pasting.

translateToEnglish.label: Translate to English
translateToEnglish.description: Automatically translate speech from other languages to English during transcription.
translateToEnglish.descriptionUnsupported: Translation is not supported by the {{model}} model.

modelUnload.title: Unload Model
modelUnload.description: Automatically free GPU/CPU memory when the model hasn't been used for the specified time

customWords.title: Custom Words
customWords.description: Add words that are often misheard or misspelled during transcription. The system will automatically correct similar-sounding words to match your list.

activeListeningToggle.label: Active Listening
activeListeningToggle.description: Enable continuous background transcription with AI-powered insights using Ollama

askAiToggle.label: Ask AI
askAiToggle.description: Record voice questions and get AI responses using Ollama

knowledgeBaseToggle.label: Knowledge Base
knowledgeBaseToggle.description: Store and search through transcriptions using local embeddings (Ollama)

postProcessing.title: Post Process
postProcessing.disabledNotice: Post processing is currently disabled. Enable it in Debug settings to configure.

appleIntelligence.title: Apple Intelligence
appleIntelligence.description: Runs fully on-device. No API key or network access is required.
appleIntelligence.requirements: Requires an Apple Silicon Mac running macOS Tahoe (26.0) or later. Apple Intelligence must be enabled in System Settings.
appleIntelligence.unavailable: Apple Intelligence is not available on this device. Requires an Apple Silicon Mac running macOS Tahoe (26.0) or later with Apple Intelligence enabled in System Settings.

baseUrl.title: Base URL
baseUrl.description: API base URL for the selected provider. Only the custom provider can be edited.

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: API key for the selected provider.

model.title: Model
model.descriptionApple: Provide an optional numeric token limit or keep the default on-device preset.
model.descriptionCustom: Provide the model identifier expected by your custom endpoint.
model.descriptionDefault: Choose a model exposed by the selected provider.

prompts.title: Prompt

selectedPrompt.title: Selected Prompt
selectedPrompt.description: Select a template for refining transcriptions or create a new one. Use ${output} inside the prompt text to reference the captured transcript.

prompts.promptInstructionsPlaceholder: Write the instructions to run after transcription. Example: Improve grammar and clarity for the following text: ${output}
prompts.promptTip: Tip: Use ${output} to insert the transcribed text in your prompt.
prompts.selectToEdit: Select a prompt above to view and edit its details.
prompts.createFirst: Click 'Create New Prompt' above to create your first post-processing prompt.

enable.title: Enable Active Listening
enable.description: Continuously transcribe audio and generate insights using a local LLM (Ollama)

activeListening.disabledNotice: Enable Active Listening above to configure Ollama and insight prompts.

baseUrl.title: Server URL
baseUrl.description: The URL of your local Ollama server

model.title: Model
model.description: Select the Ollama model to use for generating insights

duration.title: Segment Duration
duration.description: How long to wait before processing each audio segment

audioSource.title: Audio Source
audioSource.description: Select which audio to capture for transcription

type.title: Source Type
type.systemAudioDescription: Capture what others say in video calls
type.mixedDescription: Capture both your voice and system audio

mixRatio.title: Mix Balance
mixRatio.description: Adjust the balance between microphone and system audio

loopback.notAvailable: System audio capture is not available on this platform
loopback.permissionRequired: Additional permissions may be required for system audio capture
loopback.macosNote: On macOS, system audio capture requires macOS 12.3 or later

prompts.title: Insight Prompts

selectedPrompt.title: Selected Prompt
selectedPrompt.description: Select a template for generating insights or create a new one

prompts.promptTemplatePlaceholder: Write instructions for the AI. Use {{transcription}} for the transcribed text, {{previous_context}} for context, and {{session_topic}} for the session topic.
prompts.selectToEdit: Select a prompt above to view and edit its details.
prompts.createFirst: Click 'Create New' to create your first insight prompt.

meeting_notes.name: Meeting Notes
meeting_notes.description: Extract key information, action items, and decisions from conversations

objection_handler.name: Objection Handler
objection_handler.description: Real-time coach for handling objections and difficult questions

sales_coach.name: Sales Coach
sales_coach.description: Detect buying signals and get next talking point suggestions

interview_assistant.name: Interview Assistant
interview_assistant.description: Get follow-up questions and candidate assessment notes

negotiation_coach.name: Negotiation Coach
negotiation_coach.description: Tactical advice for negotiations and counter-offers

presentation_coach.name: Presentation Coach
presentation_coach.description: Real-time feedback on engagement and pacing

sessionViewer.title: Session History
sessionViewer.description: View and export your past Active Listening sessions and AI-generated insights.
sessionViewer.empty: No Active Listening sessions yet. Start a session to see your insights here.

summary.title: Meeting Summary
summary.noInsights: This session has no insights to summarize.

history.title: History
history.empty: No transcriptions yet. Start recording to build your history!
history.deleteError: Failed to delete entry. Please try again.

logDirectory.title: Log Directory
logDirectory.description: Location where log files are stored

updateChecks.label: Check for Updates
updateChecks.description: Automatically check for new versions of Handy

soundTheme.label: Sound Theme
soundTheme.description: Choose a sound theme for recording start and stop feedback

historyLimit.title: History Limit
historyLimit.description: Maximum number of history entries to keep

recordingRetention.title: Auto-Delete Recordings
recordingRetention.description: Automatically delete old recordings to save space

alwaysOnMicrophone.label: Always-On Microphone
alwaysOnMicrophone.description: Keep microphone active for faster response

clamshellMicrophone.title: Clamshell Microphone
clamshellMicrophone.description: Microphone to use when laptop lid is closed

postProcessingToggle.label: Post Processing
postProcessingToggle.description: Enable AI-powered text refinement after transcription

appendTrailingSpace.label: Append Trailing Space
appendTrailingSpace.description: Add a space after pasted transcription

appDataDirectory.title: App Data Directory
appDataDirectory.description: Location where Handy stores its data

logDirectory.title: Log Directory
logDirectory.description: Location where log files are stored

whisper.title: Whisper.cpp
whisper.description: High-performance inference of OpenAI's Whisper automatic speech recognition model
whisper.details: Handy uses Whisper.cpp for fast, local speech-to-text processing. Thanks to the amazing work by Georgi Gerganov and contributors.

enable.title: Enable Ask AI
enable.description: Record voice questions and get AI-powered responses using Ollama

askAi.disabledNotice: Enable Ask AI above to configure Ollama and view your conversation history.

baseUrl.title: Server URL
baseUrl.description: The URL of your local Ollama server

model.title: Model
model.description: Select the Ollama model to use for answering questions

systemPrompt.title: Custom System Prompt
systemPrompt.description: Customize how the AI responds to your questions. Leave empty for default behavior.
systemPrompt.placeholder: Enter custom instructions for the AI assistant...

enable.title: Enable Knowledge Base
enable.description: Store and search through transcriptions and documents using local embeddings (Ollama)

knowledgeBase.disabledNotice: Enable Knowledge Base above to configure indexing and search through your documents.

autoIndex.title: Auto-Index Transcriptions
autoIndex.description: Automatically index transcriptions from Active Listening sessions

useInActiveListening.title: Use in Active Listening
useInActiveListening.description: Include relevant context from knowledge base in Active Listening prompts

embeddingModel.title: Embedding Model
embeddingModel.description: Ollama model for generating embeddings. Recommended: nomic-embed-text

topK.title: Results to Retrieve
topK.description: Number of relevant chunks to include as context

similarityThreshold.title: Similarity Threshold
similarityThreshold.description: Minimum similarity score for results to be included (0-100%)

documents.title: Documents
documents.confirmClearAll: Are you sure you want to delete all documents from the knowledge base? This cannot be undone.
documents.empty: No documents in knowledge base. Documents will appear here when you use Active Listening or add them manually.

upload.title: Add Document
upload.contentPlaceholder: Paste or type the document content here...

accessibility.permissionsDescription: Handy needs accessibility permissions to type transcribed text.

appLanguage.title: Application Language
appLanguage.description: Change the language of the Handy interface

errors.connectionFailed: Could not connect to Ollama. Please ensure Ollama is running.
errors.noModel: No AI model selected. Please configure a model in Ask AI settings.
errors.transcriptionFailed: Failed to transcribe audio. Please try speaking more clearly.
errors.noSpeech: No speech was detected. Please speak clearly and try again.
errors.timeout: The request timed out. The AI model may be loading or busy.
errors.checkSettings: Check Ask AI settings to configure Ollama.

history.title: Conversation History
history.empty: No conversations yet. Use Ask AI to start a conversation.
